channel.title: Hacking on Carl Gaspar
channel.description: Recent content in Hacking on Carl Gaspar

item.title: Hide Yourself When Using the Internet With ProxyChains
item.description: Configuring ProxyChains ProxyChains come preinstalled in Kali Linux. All you have to do is find it. I wasn’t able to make the locate command work, but I found it in /etc directory. Step 1 What you want to do is edit the configuration file. I will be using vim, feel free to use any text editor as you would prefer. sudo vim /etc/proxychains4.conf This is what the configuration file would look like.
